Posts.Content: Hi I get the fizzy head as well after chemo it lasts a few days, I'm on my fourth one now. It also makes me feel sick and then I get the metal taste in my mouth that lasts for a week . I have found my fourth chemo to be my worse so far for the room spinning I also get the shakes as well and feel really cold . So now all I do is go to bed and rest to the feeling starts to go .
Posts.Title: spining room and nausea

Posts.Content: Hi I have just added you on Facebook hope I got the Right Jan R Hodge x
Posts.Title: facebook

Posts.Content: Hi I went to the doctors because I found a lump at first I through it was due to my periods but saddly it wasnt i am so glad I went because it turnt out to be cancer . If you have any sort of lump get it check out . I'm to 48 . My cancer was a grade 3 and fast growing ,I found my lump 10 weeks ago and since had it removed plus 3 nodes that were clear. My lump was in my right breast near my cleavage area last place I though it could be . Just to put your mind at rest get the doctor to check it please .
Posts.Title: How can you tell?

Posts.Content: I'm having a wig fitted on Wednesday at the Luton and Dunstable and they charge Â£60 for a wig . You can get a grant if you are on low earnings or get it free if you are on benefits .
Posts.Title: Wig business

Posts.Content: Happy new year to everyone. I have finished all my treatment as well it was a long journey but I got through it. This year is going to be a good one for all of us asWe are all fighters everyone of us. On Christmas Day i got engaged so I now have my wedding to plan I'm also starting a job in January so looking forward to the future xx
Posts.Title: new year onwards and upwards
